name: The Bright Star Of Seraph-Katis
description:
Sorry! this game does not have English subtitles yet.

Story:

——This is a story about a boy and a girl.

Ten years ago, the boy lost his memory and also lost his memory about her.
——A very important memory for him.

With the help of a doctor in biological brain science, the boy embarked on a journey to regain memory fragments.

Where is this place?
What happen in this world?
He woke up in a mysterious laboratory.
He met a girl with horns on her head.
……
The vague memories gradually came to mind.
But……

Features:

◆ A simple short story（
◆ With traditional 4:3 resolution（
◆ "Adventure Mode" for exploration
◆ A normal ending and a hidden ending

Staff:

◆ Script：Auiy
◆ Illustration：Auiy
◆ Background music：Auiy
◆ Theme song：优莉酱

To players:

This game is the first game I made and I realized my dream. I am the only game developer, and the theme song is composed by a friend. All the materials used in the game are original materials (without AI or materials borrowed from others), so I spent a long time learning and producing these materials. The first time I wrote a novel, the first time I learned composition and arrangement, the first time I learned Blender to create backgrounds, etc. Since this is my first game, I decided to release it to everyone for free.Although the game still has many shortcomings, I will continue to study hard and create the next good game!
